job.title: Entry Level Software Developer/Engineer
job.description: pstrongPosition DescriptionstrongppAs a Software Engineer you will be trained to develop information systems by designing developing and installing software solutions to the world class clients we servenbspCampus hires begin their careers with TCS in the Initial Learning ProgramnbspA fully paid training program designed to provide you with the information and training necessary to succeed at TCS and excel at client sites However the learning does not stop there TCS is committed to the continuous growth of its associates in line with the core value of Learning amp SharingnbspWe offer a Continuous Learning Program that spans technologies domains processes and soft skills In addition TCS associates are encouraged to undertake certifications and accreditations in a wide range of subject areas With clients located across the US and globe TCS can offer great flexibility in work location excellent career advancement and a variety of opportunities TCS mentoring career development and onthejob training ensure a smooth transition into your professional life and orient you to our culture values vision and missionppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongnbsppulliDevelop create and modify general computer application software or specialized programsnbspliliAnalyze user needs and develop software solutionsnbspliliDesign or customize software for client use to optimize operational efficiencynbspliliImprove existing systems by analyzing areas of modificationnbspliliAnalyze and design databases with application areasnbspliliCoordinate database development with a team or individuallynbspliliMaintain systems by monitoring identifying and correcting software defectsnbspliliCreate technical specifications and test plansnbspliliUpdate knowledge and skills regularly through inhouse and external courses manuals and new applicationsnbspliulpbrppstrongRequirementsstrongnbsppulliBS in Computer Science CS Information Technology IT Information Systems IS Electrical Engineering EE Computer Engineering CE Informatics or Software Engineering SEliliKnowledge of basic computer science concepts programming and Information SystemsnbspliliInterest and willingness to travel and relocatenbspliliPrevious experience in JavaJ2EE Development CC NET Python HTML SQL Javascript Development and Database
